metadata.title: CVE-2017-12874 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The InfoCard module 1.0 for SimpleSAMLphp allows attackers to spoof XML messages by leveraging an incorrect check of return values in signature validation utilities.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12874` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.14.15-1
No subscription required

notes.note: sbeattie> according to debian, issue lies in simplesamlphp/simplesamlphp-module-infocard and fixed in module version 1.0.1. The module is embedded in simplesamlphp.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
